name: Drag Queen - 60/40 Merino/Bamboo
description:
This lustrous fiber is a dream to spin. With 60% Merino and 40% Bamboo fiber, you will feel like you spinning a cloud. The bamboo fiber offers an antibacterial component and gives you a smooth spin!

Fiber = 60% Merino/40% Bamboo
Approx. 4 ounces
Feltable
Care = Hand Wash/Dry Flat
All hand dyed fibers use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Country Road - BFL
description:
This BFL (Blue Faced Leicester) wool is so soft and squishy with a beautiful crimp. It's luster and sheen takes the colors beautifully. It is sure to not disappoint any spinner!

Fiber = 100% Blue Faced Leicester
Weight = Approx. 4 ounces 
Feltable

name: Drama Queen - Box Office
description:
This springy superwash worsted weight yarn is sure to be a Box Office Smash! This 4 ply yarn made with 100% Superwash Merino is a treat for your hands to work with, and with it's springy nature, it is sure to be great for garments, textured stitches, cables, and anything else you mind could imagine!!!

Yardage: 218 yards/100 grams 
Content: 100% Superwash Merino
Weight: Worsted
Care: Machine Wash Gentle/Dry Flat 
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Darkest Hour - Dramaturg
description:
Are you looking for that perfect superwash DK yarn? Do you want a little more for your money? Dramaturg is a super squishy DK yarn milled from 100% Superwash Merino fiber. This 4 ply yarn is a 115 gram skein with 250 yards. That means you get a little more than a normal 100 gram skein. Try this yarn out for your next winter wear item and you won't be disappointed.

Yardage: 250 yards/115 grams 
Content: 100% Superwash Merino
Weight: DK 
Care: Machine Wash Gentle/Dry Flat 
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Into The Woods - Falkland
description:
This magical spinning fiber is from the Falkland Islands in the southern Atlantic Ocean. The fiber strength is generally high yet the wool is soft to handle. There are no known sheep diseases on the islands that require dipping-so they are not dipped in any chemical bath. This wool is processed in Italy using snow melt from the Alps. Approx 5 inch staple, this wool will amaze you!

Fiber = 100% Falkland Wool
Weight = Approx. 4 ounces
Feltable
Care = Hand Wash/Dry Flat
All hand dyed fibers use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Breaking Ground - Ghost Light
description:
Ghost Light is a beautiful lace weight yarn that is a blend of Superfine Merino and Silk. This gorgeous yarn has a slight sheen that is sure to make your hand knits get noticed. The silk content will also provide a wonderful drape to that next shawl or lace project in your queue. 

Yardage: 875 yards/100 grams
Content: 80% Superfine Merino & 20% Silk 
Weight: Lace 
Care: Hand Wash/Dry Flat
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Cabbage Patch - Polwarth
description:
This next-to-skin wool is great for beginning spinners! With an average 23 micron count and 4-6 staple length, this fiber is less slippery than merino which can be an easier spin for beginners.

Fiber = 100% Polwarth
Weight = Approx. 4 ounces
Feltable
Care = Hand Wash/Dry Flat
All hand dyed fibers use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Angel Hair - Showcase
description:
Showcase your next hand knit item with the Showcase base! This base is a 3 ply 100% Superwash Merino that has a great squish factor. With 490 yards in a skein, you can easily knit most average size shawls into your next master piece. Don't miss out on this amazing base!!!

Yardage: 490 yards/100 grams 
Content: 100% Superwash Merino
Weight: Fingering 
Care: Machine Wash Gentle/Dry Flat 
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Drama Queen - Show Stopper
description:
Show Stopper is the perfect sock yarn. It has your basic composition of sock yarn with Superwash Merino and Nylon, but there is nothing basic about it! This base is so soft you won't be able to not have it next to your skin. 

Yardage: 463 yards/100 grams 
Content: 75% Superwash Merino & 25% Nylon
Weight: Fingering 
Care: Machine Wash Gentle/Dry Flat 
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

Content: 75% Superwash Merino & 25% Nylon
Weight: Fingering 
Care: Machine Wash Gentle/Dry Flat 
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

name: Perfection - Soliloquy
description:
Soliloquy is an extra large skein of fingering weight perfect for your next large shawl project. This 4 ply 100% Superwash BFL yarn is just the right choice to create a fabric that has great stitch definition, but yet soft enough for that delicate lace effect. 

Yardage: 657 yards/150 grams 
Content: 100% Superwash BFL
Weight: Fingering
Care: Machine Wash Gentle/Dry Flat 
All hand dyed yarns use professional acid dyes and are heat set to retain color.

description:

name: Enchanted Forest (Handspun)
description:
Enchanted Forest is a beautiful mix of green and pink.

This skein of handspun yarn is chain plied with 75% Coopworth & 25% Silk fiber. It is an average of DK weight. This is a rustic yarn. There are a total of 172 yards in the skein.

Items made from this product should be hand washed and laid flat to dry.
